mapper.select: SELECT tb_order_seq.NEXTVAL as orderId FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order (order_id, user_id, popup_store_id, amount, order_toss_id, order_card_type, url, easy_pay, method) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{storeId}, #{totalAmount}, #{orderTossId}, #{cardType}, #{url}, #{easyPay}, #{method})
INSERT INTO tb_order_item (order_id, popup_store_item_id, total_amount, total_quantity) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{itemId}, #{totalItemAmount}, #{totalQuantity})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_order WHERE user_id = #{userId} order by status, created_at desc

select a.title, a.place_detail, b.place_description from tb_popup_store a join( select * from tb_department where department_id = (select department_id from tb_popup_store where popup_store_id= #{popupStoreId})) b on a.department_id = b.department_id where a.popup_store_id=#{popupStoreId}

select a.order_id,a.popup_store_id, a.status, a.amount,a.created_at, a.order_toss_id,a.order_card_type,a.method, b.name from tb_order a join tb_user b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.popup_store_id=#{popupStoreId} order by created_at desc

select a.popup_store_item_id, a.total_amount, a.total_quantity, b.name, b.amount, b.img_url, b.stock, b.order_limit from tb_order_item a join tb_popup_store_item b on a.popup_store_item_id = b.popup_store_item_id where a.order_id = #{orderId} order by popup_store_item_id
